name: FRIENDS OF THE NATIONAL WORLD WAR II MEMORIAL
description: Non-profit organization dedicated to honoring and preserving the national memory of WW2.
sampleDescriptions: Outreach to House and Senate offices on the FY 2019 National Defense Authorization Act to explore possibility of including a provision in the NDAA to have DoD formally commemorate the 75th anniversary

Outreach to provide information on the education and outreach programs of the Friends of the National World War II Memorial, and to gain information on possible competitive federal grant opportunities
Outreach to House and Senate offices on the FY 2019 National Defense Authorization Act in support of amendment to the  NDAA to have DoD formally commemorate the 75th anniversary of World War II.

Outreach to provide information on the education and outreach programs of the Friends of the National World War II Memorial, and to gain information on possible competitive federal grant opportunities

Outreach to House and Senate offices on the FY 2019 National Defense Authorization Act and the FY 2019 Defense Appropriations bill in support of amendment to the NDAA and the FY 2019 Defense Appropria
